Name: Fur Collar
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Apricot brandy adds fruity zingyness to what otherwise would be a Screwdriver served straight-up.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Ted Saucier's 1951 Bottoms Up book.
Nutrition: One serving of Fur Collar contains 147 calories
